verbose_text: Bath application of GPT (20 U/ml + 6 mM pyruvate), which inhibited calcium events driven by glutamate uncaging (XREF_FIG B), also led to a significant reduction in spontaneous mCaTs compared with a pyruvate only control (GPT : p < 0.01, XREF_FIG C).
